text:
So far only 8% of volunteers on our #COVID19 #vaccine  trial are from an ethnic minority background.
We have appointments available throughout the day on Tues, Weds and Thurs next week. Visit our website https://t.co/U4MKRLBsgI or email ENSEMBLE2_Mailbox@uhl-tr.nhs.uk for more https://t.co/jea38dLc88
